New Records: LeBron James surpassed Michael Jordan as the leader in all-time 30-point games during the Lakers-Hawks game.
LeBron James scored 30 points with 13/20 field goal accuracy and 2/5 three-point accuracy in the game.
Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Atlanta Hawks 119-102 in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: The Los Angeles Lakers improved to 20-14 in the Western Conference with the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked LeBron James' continued dominance and his impact on the NBA's historical records.
